title: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Camera
description: A high-performance mirrorless camera with a classic aesthetic, featuring a 16.3MP APS-C sensor and rapid autofocus. Includes 18-55mm lens.

title: Gibson Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar
description: Stunning Blue Burst finish with humbucker pickups. Known for its rich sustain and warm tone, perfect for studio sessions.

title: MacBook Pro Developer Setup
description: A powerful workstation featuring high-resolution display and optimized for full-stack development. Ideal for React and C++ compilation.

title: Omega Seamaster Co-Axial Chronometer
description: A luxury diver's watch featuring a blue dial, stainless steel bracelet, and 600m water resistance. A masterpiece of horology.

title: Mid-Century Modern Wooden Chair
description: A handcrafted vintage dining chair with intricate wood grain details and a sturdy ladder-back design. Perfect for minimalist interiors.

title: Signed 'Milk and Honey' by Rupi Kaur
description: A beautiful hardcover edition of the New York Times bestseller. Includes original illustrations and author signature.

title: Classic Still Life Floral Screen Print
description: An original large-format screen print of a Dutch-style floral arrangement. Features vibrant colors on a deep black background.
